    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Izdelava spletnih strani</string>
            <string language="en">Web pages design</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webseiten Design</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conception de pages Web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto dos Web pages</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Disegno di Web pagi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο ιστοσελίδας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diseño de las paginaciones del Web</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Predstavitev spletnih strani, tipi spletnih strani, pregled jezikov in orodij za njihovo izgradnjo.</string>
            <string language="en">Introduction to web pages, types of pages, list of most common languages and tools for building web pages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">evizus</string>
            <string language="en">evizus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">spletna stran</string>
            <string language="en">web page</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">html</string>
            <string language="en">html</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">oblikovanje</string>
            <string language="en">design</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">strežnik</string>
            <string language="en">server</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung in Webseiten, Typen der Seiten, Liste 
der meisten Standardsprachen und eine Hilfsmittel für das Aufbauen 
von von Webseiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction aux pages Web, aux types de pages, 
à la liste de la plupart des langages communs et aux outils pour 
établir des pages Web.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução aos Web pages, aos tipos de páginas,
à lista de a maioria de línguas comuns e às ferramentas para 
construir Web pages.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione ai Web pagi, ai tipi di pagine, alla 
lista della maggior parte dei linguaggi comuni ed agli strumenti per 
lo sviluppo dei Web pagi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή ιστοσελίδας, τύποι σελίδων, κατάλογος των 
περισσότερων κοινών γλωσσών και εργαλείων για ιστοσελίδας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Introducción a los Web pages, a los tipos de 
paginaciones, a la lista de la mayoría de los lenguajes comunes y a 
las herramientas para construir Web pages.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">evizus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webseite</string>
